keyMoments.title: Final Agents Defend Crocodile's Plan
keyMoments.description: Mr. 7 and Miss Father's Day, Frontier Agents of Baroque Works, guard the bomb at the clock tower as the last line of defense for Crocodile's scheme to destroy Alabasta.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the final obstacle posed by Baroque Works in preventing the salvation of Alabasta. Shows the organization's loyalty to Crocodile's plan even as it falls apart.

statusHistory.description: Criminal organization executing Crocodile's plan in Arabasta

keyMoments.title: Luffy Fights to Save Alabasta
keyMoments.description: Captain Luffy battles Crocodile in their third confrontation, fighting to protect Vivi's kingdom and stop the Warlord's schemes.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's commitment to helping their friend Vivi save her kingdom, even when it means facing one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea.

keyMoments.title: Crew Converges on the Clock Tower
keyMoments.description: Multiple Straw Hat crew members (Nami, Chopper, Usopp, Zoro, Sanji) converge on the clock tower to help stop the bomb and save Alabasta.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew working together in parallel efforts - Luffy fighting Crocodile underground while the others race to stop the bomb above ground.

statusHistory.description: Pirate crew sailing the Grand Line
